channel.title: notes on Just Random Notes
channel.description: Recent content in notes on Just Random Notes

item.title: Create blog with GH pages/Hugo
item.description: Github setup I have a corporate account and wanted to use my personal account for hosting my blog. So essentially it could be using 2 different SSH key and auth with separate keys – since I have my company auth with OSXKeychain, I just did it for my personal one, and it will be the same for another account if I need it Create SSH keys $ cd ~/.

item.title: My Python Dev Env setup
item.description: Making a note to jot down the tools I preferred to use when setting up Python development environment – there should be one– and preferably only one –obvious way to do things Terminal/REPL/IDE zsh/oh-my-zsh https://ohmyz.sh/ plugins=(git history-substring-search zsh-autosuggestions) theme: power10k iTerm2 iPython/bpython VsCode Python environment management Managing virtualenv â€” virtualenv/virtualenvwrapper or venv manages virtual environments for a specific Python version. Managing multiple Python versions With pyenv
